effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 50% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 20%, stacking up to 2 times.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 858 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 858 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
